thread.section_title: Kiwi Drug Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Kiwi Drug | kiwidrug.com
thread.title: Don P.
thread.title_full: Kiwi Drug reviewed by Don P.

author: Don P.
title: Don P.
text:
I have been using Kiwi Drug for several months now and it would be hard to be any happier. Locally my prescriptions are very expensive, but now that I have found kiwi I can finally afford my prescriptions. The meds are the same for a reasonable price. I can't say enough good things. Thank you so much.
Don from Florida
